pr_title: Let `isInetAddress` utility understand the scope ID on ipv6

timeline.message: let isInetAddress utility understand the scope ID on ipv6

timeline.bodyText:
should we make sure that we have something after the % in the string and maybe return null if percentIndex == ipString.length() - 1 because that wouldn't be a valid address would it?
Unless you disagree with filtering this case out, could you also add a test for it when adding this check?
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.message: Let  utility understand the scope ID on ipv6

timeline.bodyText: Let's add a comment here that explains that we are doing this check to filter out strings that end in % and have an empty scope ID.
timeline.author: original-brownbear

timeline.message: let isInetAddress utility understand the scope ID on ipv6
